title: Service Level Management and reports
content:
Service Management's reporting functionality allows you to see how your Service Level Management is performing, using out-of-the-box reports, or reports that you create.

The available out-of-the-box reports include:

  • Average elapsed duration for incidents and requests by priority, service, or group
  • Chat request response achievement rate
  • Initial review and resolution achievement rate for incidents and requests
  • SLT achievement percentage for incidents
  • SLT achievement percentage for incidents in initial review or resolution by owning group, priority, or service
  • SLT achievement percentage for requests
  • SLT achievement percentage for requests in chat request response by assignment group, priority, or service
  • SLT achievement percentage for requests in initial review by assignment group, priority, or service
  • SLT achievement percentage for requests in resolution by assignment group, priority, or service
  • SLT overall report by record and target type
  • Status of active Fulfillment SLTs
  • Status of active Time in Group OLTs
  • Analysis of Group load by OLA
  • Resolution SLT achievement results by team
  • SLT achievement rate for changes
  • SLT achievement percentage for changes in classification by owning group
  • SLT achievement percentage for changes in classification by priority
  • SLT achievement percentage for changes in classification by service
  • SLT achievement percentage for changes in deployment by owning group
  • SLT achievement percentage for changes in deployment by priority
  • SLT achievement percentage for changes in deployment by service
  • SLT achievement percentage for changes in planning by owning group
  • SLT achievement percentage for changes in planning by priority
  • SLT achievement percentage for changes in planning by service
  • SLT achievement percentage for changes in validation by owning group
  • SLT achievement percentage for changes in validation by priority
  • SLT achievement percentage for changes in validation by service
  • Classification achievement rate for Changes
  • Planning achievement rate for Changes
  • Deployment achievement rate for Changes
  • Validation achievement rate for Changes
  • Status of active Time in Group OLTs for changes
  • SLT achievement rate for Changes
  • SLT achievement rate for tasks 
  • Average elapsed duration for tasks by group 
  • Status of active Completion SLTs per group
  • Status of active Time in Group OLTs for Tasks
  • Average elapsed duration for problems by priority
  • Average elapsed duration for problems by Service
  • SLT achievement percentage for problems by target type
  • SLT achievement percentage for problems by service
  • SLT achievement percentage for problems by priority
  • SLT achievement percentage for problems by assignment group
  • SLT achievement rate for problems

You can also find the following widget for Change on the Dashboard:

  • SLT achievement rate for Changes 

You can also find the following reports on the Task Overview Dashboard:

  • Critical tasks due today by group
  • Critical tasks due today by service
  • Status of active Completion SLTs per group
  • SLT achievement rate for tasks
  • Status of active Time in Group OLTs for Tasks

You can also find the following reports on the Problem Overview Dashboard:

  • Average elapsed duration for problems by priority
  • Average elapsed duration for problems by Service
  • SLT achievement percentage for problems by target type
  • SLT achievement percentage for problems by service
  • SLT achievement percentage for problems by priority
  • SLT achievement percentage for problems by assignment group
  • SLT achievement rate for problems
  • Problems by category
  • Problems by owning group
  • Problems by priority
  • Problems by status
  • Problems unassigned by priority
  • My problems by priority

For information on how to create a Service Level target (SLT) performance report, see How to work with reports.

When creating or editing a Service Level Target (SLT) performance report, you can select the Percentage of time elapsed field as one of the grouping options in the report. This field represents the percent of target time that has already passed. For more information on how to select a grouping field for a report, see Report properties.

Related topics

  • Reports
  • Report properties
  • Service Level Target calculations
  • Service Level Target status and history
